price: Maadui hawatakudhuruni ila ni maudhi tu. Na wakipigana nanyi watakupeni mgongo, na tena hawatanusuriwa.
arabic: لَن يَضُرُّوكُمۡ إِلَّآ أَذٗىۖ وَإِن يُقَٰتِلُوكُمۡ يُوَلُّوكُمُ ٱلۡأَدۡبَارَ ثُمَّ لَا يُنصَرُونَ
footnotes: Hao wapotovu hawawezi kukudhuruni nyinyi kama walivyo kuandalieni, wala hawakuathirini. Ijapo kuwa mtapata maudhi kwao, lakini athari yake haiselelei. Na hata wakipigana nanyi wataingia kiwewe wakimbie wasipambane nanyi, na hapo mwishoe hawatopata ushindi juu yenu maadamu nyinyi mtashikamana na kuamrisha mema na kukataza maovu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lan yaḍurrūkum illā adhan wa-in yuqātilūkum yuwallūkumu al-adbāra thumma lā yunṣarūna
